thread.section_title: Four Seasons Hotel Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good service - Review
thread.title_full: Good service - Review of Four Seasons Hotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Alan D
title: Good service - Review
text:
Hi
I was in Beijing early this month with my girlfriend and we are from Canada
We booked this hotel through a person named Emily Cui, she is very welcoming and patient. She gave us lot of tips and information about the hotel and the city itself. A very enthusiastic and energetic person. For sure I'll recommend this hotel once again
Alan
